items.title: Telios for iOS & Android - Decentralized & Encrypted Email
items.description: P2P encrypted email. Currently building iOS and Android apps using React Native and nodejs-mobile running hypercore

items.title: BatterUp - Live Fan Interaction Game
items.description: iOS and Android app for fans to compete at live baseball games. Project and parent company (Flytrapps) sunsetted in 2019 :(

items.title: One Second Everyday - Video Journal
items.description: I take a clip (almost) every day and stitch them together at the end of each year. Ongoing project since 2013.

items.title: Flooded - iOS Game
items.description: A fun fast-paced arcade game for iOS. Created in 2014. (In need of an update!)
